title: Karmuh Slack App
subtitle: Slack co-worker appreciation plugin
detail: A fun side project where I assisted with front end duties and Lottie JSON (svg) animations and the creation of an app on the Slack app directory.

title: Cultural Revolution Ceramics
subtitle: A digital exhibition of various artifacts from San Diego's Chinese Historical Museum
detail: Armed with a friend's pixel-perfect Figma mockup, I delved deeper into Webflow for this project. Created a custom visual theme using this WYSIWYG editor, and sprinkled in some custom Javsacript when necessary.

title: Open Learning Component Library
subtitle: McGraw Hill UI component library with implementation examples.
detail: Visual Style Guide / UI Component Library that bridged the gap between UX and developer teams at McGraw Hill. A GitHub Pages-hosted demo page consumed SCSS styles and SVG assets from their respective npm packages.

media.embed: <iframe width="90%" height="480" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/D1YO4YxmCX0?&autoplay=1" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

title: Starterkit Media
subtitle: Responsive landing page for media production company.
detail: Media-rich website for production company with offices in Los Angeles and Kauai. Website template allows for embedding of videos from YouTube and Vimeo, as well as music from SoundCloud, BandCamp and iTunes.

title: Architecture Study Guide
subtitle: Color-coordinated flashcards representing architectural objects from various historic periods.
detail: Study guide used for a historical survey of global architecture class at USC. Check out the website screencapture in the [Vimeo app](https://vimeo.com/160999718) or watch it below.

media.embed: <iframe src='https://player.vimeo.com/video/160999718?autoplay=1&loop=1&autopause=0' width='100%' height='auto'  frameborder='0' allow='autoplay; fullscreen' allowfullscreen></iframe>

title: FIFA Gate Soccer Scandal
subtitle: Visualization showcasing the 2015 global corruption scheme via money flows between FIFA officials and conspirators.
detail: This force graph visualization outlines 12 different schemes, as laid out by the FBI in 2015. The **Icons** represent each _Actor_ involved, **Colors** denote _Connection_ types, and **Line Type** defines actual vs planned _Payoffs_. Featured on USA Today's Fields of Green soccer blog. Collaborative project with [Rook Campbell, PhD](https://uscpublicdiplomacy.org/users/rook_campbell) - USC Center on Public Diplomacy.

title: Middle of June
subtitle: A Los Angeles live music event aggregator with which searches for detailed artist info and associated video clips.
detail: A nodeschool LA side project served as motivation to working with Promise chains. When a live show is clicked on, the artist name is used to query AllMusic for their bio, then query YouTube API for any their videos.

title: Waterbowl
subtitle: A social network for dog lovers (iOS mobile app).
detail: A first foray into mobile development. Users were able to create a profile for their pet and _tag_ various dog parks around town, and communicate with other dog owners. Actual in-app screens below.

title: Tracking Live Music Venues
subtitle: Los Angeles live music venue density map.
detail: A visualization of 210 live music events taking place at 87 different venues across Los Angeles, over the course of a week. Data scraped from Ticketfly.
